title: How to Level Up in Pokémon Diamond and Pearl

steps.title: Put two of the Pokémon you wish to level up in the daycare.
steps.content: Put two of the Pokémon you wish to level up in the daycare.

steps.title: Put two level 70-100 Pokémon in your party.
steps.content: Put two level 70-100 Pokémon in your party.

steps.title: Get four Pokémon that are weak and you want to level them up.
steps.content: Get four Pokémon that are weak and you want to level them up.

steps.title: Give them Exp.
steps.content: Give them Exp. share. If you don't have enough, then start by training one of them, and then switch every time you finish a battle. Easier target is Elite Four since you got two level 100 Pokémon.

steps.title: Go to Stark Mountain or Turnback Cave with a level 100 Water type Pokémon and an exp.
steps.content: Go to Stark Mountain or Turnback Cave with a level 100 Water type Pokémon and an exp. share on the Pokémon you are raising.

steps.title: Eterna Forest is a good spot to train with Cheryl.
steps.content: Eterna Forest is a good spot to train with Cheryl. You get more than 200 experience each battle and a full heal. It's a good spot to train for Gardenia.

steps.title: Wayward Cave is a good spot to train with Mina.
steps.content: Wayward Cave is a good spot to train with Mina. You get more than 200 experience each battle and a full heal. It's a good spot to train for Mina.

steps.title: Buy full restores, revives, max potions, etc.
steps.content: Buy full restores, revives, max potions, etc. , until you don't have money or you can't buy more things.

steps.title: Talk to the guy in front of the door to go to the elite four and beat your rival.
steps.content: Talk to the guy in front of the door to go to the elite four and beat your rival.

steps.title: Go and try to beat Aaron.
steps.content: Go and try to beat Aaron. If you beat it beat Bertha and etc.

steps.title: You can give an EXP.
steps.content: You can give an EXP. Share to your low level Pokémon and go to Victory Road and the Elite Four and keep battling to get your Pokémon's Level up.
